data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe an anniversary celebration.
data.answer: I would like to describe an anniversary celebration with my boyfriend who is about 25 years old. Until last weekend, we have already made an exclusive relationship for one year and he told me that we needed to celebrate this anniversary. I thought that it was a good idea and probably we could have a party together. After discussing it for two hours, we decided to have a party in a five-star restaurant which was located in the city centre. Besides, he also bought one big cake and a necklace for me. Thus, I also prepared a pair of sneakers for him. On that day, we went to that luxury restaurant together and had dinner; then, we exchanged gifts and eat that tasty cake. This was an anniversary celebration, which happened last weekend.
